embed1.title: Help Menu
embed1.description:
[name] is a easy-to-use Fortnite bot.

**Links**
[Privacy Policy]([website]/privacy-policy)
[Terms of Service]([website]/tos)
[Support Server]([supportServer])
[Invite Link]([invite])

preferences.language: Your preferred bot language has been set to [language].
preferences.replyType:
Your preferred reply type has been set to [type].

Note: Only success, error and warning messages are affected by this setting
preferences.auto: Your preferred bot language is automatically set to [language].

censorTypes.none: Your preferred censor type has been set to **None**. Your display name and account ID will not be censored.
censorTypes.dm: Your preferred censor type has been set to **DM**. Your display name and account ID will be censored only in DMs.
censorTypes.server: Your preferred censor type has been set to **Server**. Your display name and account ID will be censored only in servers.
censorTypes.all: Your preferred censor type has been set to **All**. Your display name and account ID will be censored in both DMs and servers.

general.didntconnectdb: The command couldn't be executed because the bot couldn't connect to the database. Please try again later and join our [support server]([support]) for more information.
general.blacklist: You can't use the bot. You were blacklisted with reason: [reason]. Join our [support server]([support]) for more information.
general.blacklistguild: You can't use the bot in this server. This server was blacklisted with reason: [reason]. Join our [support server]([support]) for more information.
general.supserveronly: You can only use this command in [our support server]([support]).
general.loginreq: Please login via [command] command to use this command.
general.dataerror: We had to log you out of your account because your data was not properly processed in the database. Please log in again, and if the issue persists, join our [support server]([support]) for assistance.
general.servererror: Commands interacting with Epic Games are temporarily disabled due to Epic Games servers being offline. Please check the status of servers [here](https://status.epicgames.com/).
general.hadtologout:
Your session has been terminated! It could be due to one of the following reasons:
• Your session timed out.
• Your account's password has changed.
• Epic Games or you revoked all authorizations.

You have been automatically logged out of your account. You can log in again.
general.missingperms: This command couldn't be executed because of missing permissions on your account.
general.error: An unexpected error occurred while executing this command, and the error has been reported to the developers. Please join our [support server]([support]) for assistance.
general.acceptedtryagain: You have accepted the rules. Click the button again to continue.
general.alreadyloggedin: You have already logged in with this account.
general.help: If you need help, join our [support server]([support]).

deviceidcreated.title: Device Auth Created
deviceidcreated.footer: To log out and delete your account information from the bot, use the /logout command.

general.dontuseanother: Please log in to the bot using only the link provided by the bot.
general.expiredExchange: An error occurred while logging in. The Exchange Code may have expired. Please try again.
general.notactive: The command couldn't be executed because your Epic account ([accountId]) is disabled by Epic Games. Please contact Epic Games using [this link](https://www.epicgames.com/help/en-US/contact-us) for more information.
general.banned: Sorry, it appears that your account has been banned by Epic Games. Please contact Epic Games using [this link](https://www.epicgames.com/help/en-US/contact-us) for more information.
general.dmonly: This command can only be used in DMs.
general.premium: You can read this message [messageLink] [in our support server]([support]) to learn more about Premium!
general.premiumGuild: The owner of this server must have Premium to use this command. You can read this message [messageLink] [in our support server]([support]) to learn more about Premium!
general.missingpermissions: You must have [perm] permission to use this command.
general.missingpermsbot: I must have [perm] permission to use this command.

errorTitles: :warning: Not the Llama You're Looking For!

rules.title: Please Read Before Logging in:
rules.description:
1. Bot uses personal data collected from users, such as Epic Games account information, only to use it to provide the services provided. Your data will never be shown, sold, rented to a third party.
2. We do not accept any responsibility for any action taken against your account, including but not limited to restrictions, closures, or bans. These situations can be caused by commands or unintended use of commands.
3. Please use this bot only if you fully accept the risks involved and fully agree to the [Terms of Service](https://rookie-spitfire.cf/tos) and [Privacy Policy](https://rookie-spitfire.cf/privacy-policy).

**Only click the "I Agree" button below if you agree to these terms!**

commandData.localizedDescription: Manage the rank-role system in your server to let users get roles using /claim-rank-role command

options.name: add
options.localizedDescription: Add a rank-role system to your server

options.name: remove
options.localizedDescription: Remove a rank-role system from your server

options.name: list
options.localizedDescription: List the rank-role systems in your server

options.name: enable
options.localizedDescription: Enable the rank-role system in your server

options.name: disable
options.localizedDescription: Disable the rank-role system in your server

commandData.name: account-settings
commandData.localizedDescription: Update your Epic Games account settings

options.name: state
options.localizedDescription: Whether to receive gifts or not
